Rotate user's `code_id`.

###### GET /me/code

```
// cURL Example
curl -i -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..fLpAT5_Xku0oEUmSfzxH7FJeWbktxIksxGs1VSYtAF0Dhj7L8XVCdPHGgXfYotceE-H3PrkxO_aIJKPxOPS2YJBLVXCGTGoi_DSDcNweXCAD5pol9NEGIDgB04fcQJNEWUsrtZM_mpFLjBhOos-S-2Qf0CrVVu36MOYpj1VEspQ" "https://api.mixin.one/me/code"
```
